actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Navigation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Navigation

official_title: To amend title 46, United States Code, to prohibit the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating from establishing any fee or charge for issuing a license, certificate of registry, or merchant mariners' document under that title.

summary.text: Amends Federal law relating to Coast Guard user fees to prohibit any fee for issuance of licenses, certificates of registry, or merchant mariner's documents under specified provisions.

titles.title: To amend title 46, United States Code, to prohibit the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating from establishing any fee or charge for issuing a license, certificate of registry, or merchant mariners' document under that title.
